{"id":1045708027,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 months, 1 week","timestamp":1694355709,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"27 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1045708027/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Median of Two Sorted Arrays","memory":"90 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    double findMedianSortedArrays(vector<int>& a, vector<int>& b) {\n        vector<int>v(a.begin(),a.end());\n        for(int i=0;i<b.size();i++){\n            v.push_back(b[i]);\n        }\n        sort(v.begin(),v.end());\n        int n=v.size();\n        double ans=0;\n        if(n%2==0){\n            ans= ((double)(v[n/2]+v[n/2-1]))/2.0;\n        }else ans= ((double)v[n/2]);\n        \n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"median-of-two-sorted-arrays","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
